  • java.lang.Object
    • cafe.util.LRUCache<K,V>

    public class LRUCache<K,V>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Map<K,V>, java.io.Serializable
    LRUCache.java. A wrapper class implements Least-Recently-Used cache backed by a LinkedHashMap.
    Version:
    1.0 09/19/2012
    Author:
    Wen Yu, yuwen_66@yahoo.com
    See Also:
